dict.string: Copyright Clinic uses Bluetooth to connect to wireless audio devices during virtual consultation sessions with attorneys.
Copyright Clinic needs access to your calendar to schedule and manage consultation appointments with attorneys.
Copyright Clinic uses the camera to capture documents or images for payment purposes and having virtual consultation sessions with attorneys.
Copyright Clinic needs access to your contacts to help you share case information or invite others to consultations.
Copyright Clinic uses the microphone to convert your speech to text for easier input and having virtual consultation sessions with attorneys.
Copyright Clinic needs access to your photo library to attach relevant documents and images to your copyright case.
Copyright Clinic uses speech recognition to convert your voice to text for describing copyright issues.
